noclip-totem.name: Totem of Undying animation
noclip-totem.description: Settings for the Totem animation when dying with noclip on.

enable-totem.name: Enable Totem Animation
enable-totem.description: Enable the totem animation when dying with noclip on.

totem-cooldown.name: Totem Cooldown
totem-cooldown.description: The cooldown for how often can the totem animation be played. Higher cooldown means less totem animations, even if you're constantly dying.

totem-scale.name: Totem Scale
totem-scale.description: The scale of the totem animation on screen. Higher scale means bigger totem. Around 2.7 mimics the size of the Vanilla animation.

name: Noclip Totem of Undying
description: Displays MC's Totem animation on NoClip death
